question: 絞る
sourceAnswer: to{} wring-(towel,-rag)/squeeze | squeeze-(fruit-to-extract-juice)/press/extract/milk/express-milk | rack-(one's-brains)/strain-(one's-voice) | extort/exploit | chew-out/reprimand-severely/rake-over-the-coals/give-a-sound-scolding/tell-someone-off/scold/rebuke | drill-into/train | narrow-down-(one's-focus)/whittle-down | gather-up-(curtain,-etc.)/tighten-(drawstring) | stop-down-(lens) | turn-down-(e.g.-radio) | bend-(bow)/draw | hold-down/constrict/immobilize
sourceMnemonic: You've learned that the kanji <ja>絞</ja> means <kanji>strangle</kanji>. <ja>絞る</ja>, on the other hand, means <vocabulary>to wring out</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to squeeze</vocabulary> something like a towel, or <vocabulary>to narrow down</vocabulary> ideas.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Your friend wants <vocabulary>to wring out</vocabulary> a towel, but before she does so <reading>she bow</reading>s (<ja>しぼ</ja>) to the towel to show her respect for it.
